scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -g d3-color:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-cam02.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-cam02.js -c -m -o build/d3-cam02.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && cp ../d3-cam02/build/d3-cam02.js d3-cam02.v0.1.js && cp ../d3-cam02/build/d3-cam02.min.js d3-cam02.v0.1.min.js && git add d3-cam02.v1.js d3-cam02.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-cam02 ${VERSION}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-cam02.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-cam02.js build/d3-cam02.min.js
